document.docAuthor: Niu, Ze-Qing, Wu, Yan-Ru & Zhu, Chao-Dong
document.docTitle: Bathanthidium Niu, Wu & Zhu, 2012, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Bathanthidium Mavromoustakis (Hymenoptera: Megachilidae: Anthidiini) from China, with a key to the species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Bathanthidium Mavromoustakis (Hymenoptera: Megachilidae: Anthidiini) from China, with a key to the species

heading.emphasis:
Key to the species of
Bathanthidium

subSubSection.paragraph:
(Males of
B. ( B. ) hainanense
,
sp. nov.
,
B. ( B. ) emeiense
, and
B. ( S. ) circinatum
unknown.)

paragraph.keyLead:
-. Fovea behind propodeal spiracle elongate, weakly delimited (
Fig. 18
,
48, 54
); T 7 of male simple or with slightly produced median lobe; basal zone of propodeum and pits variable; T 6 of male with elevated median section or surface convex...... 2

2 . Basal zone of propodeum distinct laterally, with regular, shiny, nearly horizontal pits (
Fig. 18
, 47 ); T 6 of male with surface convex (eastern palearctic)............................................................... 8 B. ( Stenanthidiellum )

-. Basal zone of propodeum not distinct, with irregular, sculptured, sloping pits laterally; T 6 of male with elevated median section and concave lateral sections (oriental) ( INDIA : Assam; BURMA : Tenasserim; MALAYSIA )......................................................................................................
B. ( Manthidium ) binghami

4 . Clypeus, mesoscutum without yellow marks; paraocular area with dull red marks; T 2 -T 5 with broken yellow bands; T 6 black ( CHINA : Fujian, Gansu).....................................................................
B. ( B. ) atriceps

5 . Clypeus black, without lateral yellow marks (
Fig. 2
, 23 ); paraocular area with little yellow mark (
Fig. 2
, 23 ).............. 6

7 . Mandible 3 teeth; third flagellum slightly longer than second one; T 2 -T 5 with lateral oval yellow marks, not entire yellow bands ( CHINA : Fujian, Gansu)................................................................
B. ( B. ) atriceps

9 . T 7 without teeth; gonostylus only with a small notch at the proximal end ( CHINA : Beijing, Heilongjiang, Jilin, Neimenggu, Hebei, Zhejiang, Sichuan; RUSSIA : eastern Siberia).............................................
B. ( S. ) sibiricum

-. T 7 with teeth; gonostylus with a deep notch at the proximal end ( SOUTH KOREA ).....................
B. ( S. ) malaisei

10 . Clypeus yellow, middle with circle black mark (
Fig. 15
)..........................................
B. ( S. ) circinatum

11 . Metasoma terga shiny; mandible 2 teeth ( CHINA : Beijing, Heilongjiang, Jilin, Neimenggu, Hebei, Zhejiang, Sichuan; RUS- SIA: eastern Siberia)......................................................................
B. ( S. ) sibiricum

-. Metasoma terga dull, not shiny; mandible 4 teeth ( SOUTH KOREA ).................................
B. ( S. ) malaisei
